level.text: 2306.1 Any person may request the Director to make a determination whether aevice falls within the exception to the definition of “destructive device”et forth in § 101(7)(E)(iv) of the Act (D.C. Official Code §-2501.01(7)(E)(iv) (2013 Supp.)).

2306.2 Each request for a determination shall be in writing, state the name andddress of the manufacturer(s) of the device, accurately describe the device,nd give the reasons the requestor believes the device qualifies for placementn the list.
2306.3 No person requesting a determination for a device already possessed byhe requestor shall be charged with a violation of the Act prior to the adoptionf a final rule.
